entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023
